channel.title: Monster DB Info
channel.description: I was thinking about it, and somewhere in the Runescape Monster Database there has to be some kind of information about what every monster drops and how often it drops, and I wanted to know how often certain monsters drop certain items. Could anyone point me in the right direction as where to look for this info or possibly give it to me? Thanks, it'd really help me out.

item.title: Monster DB Info
item.dc:creator: @eaglith eaglith
item.description:
@eaglith wrote:

I’m looking for percentages and rates of drops

Read full topic
